contentrichtext.text: {{Non-free promotional|image_has_rationale=yes}} {{Non-free use rationale |Description=Scan of the cover of the system manual for the Fairchild Channel F System 2. |Source=[[Fairchild Semiconductor]] |Article=Fairchild Channel F |Portion=Front cover |Low_resolution=Yes |Purpose=Illustrate the visual differences between the original Fairchild and the Fairchild II |Replaceability=Yes, with a photograph of the actual system. |other_information=The depicted console is very rare. }} {{Non-free use rationale |Description=Scan of the cover of the system manual for the Fairchild Channel F System 2. |Source=[[Fairchild Semiconductor]] |Article=History of video game consoles (second generation) |Portion=Front cover |Low_resolution=Yes |Purpose=Part of a gallery showing the consoles considered to be of the second generation. |Replaceability=Yes, with a photograph of the actual system. }}
